column17:
Playboy Play it Sexy Deodorant Spray - 150 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.199

She is the woman in that hot little black number that makes the men drop their jaws. Her allure is hard to resist as she dominates the attention without even trying. For the woman who is at her sultry best Playboy presents Play It Sexy the fragrance that captures the essence of her smoking hotness. The mass premium trips you up as she passes by making you her willing slave. The deodorant spray tops off your exquisite perfection on every evening that matters the oriental notes add just the right amount of sass to your natural appeal. Let your hair down and enjoy the ride that Play It Sexy takes you on.

With succulent opening notes with accords of pink grapefruit mandarin and pink pepper brighten up the fragrance. Fiesty and feminine the fragrance becomes irresistible as it wears on. Jasmine tea osmanthus and liquorice add color to the soft heart notes as they slowly waft into the deliciousness of vanilla along with soothing sandalwood and tonka bean a wafting trail left behind by the dry down. Bottled in a playfully pink bottle that is not only easy to use but also convenient to carry around during your travels Play It Sexy is a fragrance that caters to the woman of today. Be it ladies’ night or cocktail hour casual or formal Play It Sexy Deo Spray remains a fragrance that will dissolve even the most ressolute of minds.

column17:
Playboy Play it Spicy Deodorant Spray - 150 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.195

Sensuous and seductive the woman adorns herself with Play It Spicy Deo Spray with the definite intent of making good all the whispered promises of an earlier time. The mass premium suffuses her whole being in a desirability that is hard to resist even by the men with the firmest of resolves. The deodorant spray brings alive the night with vibes of spice that border on madness.  Spice up your dinner date and step up the tease and the playfulness with this fragrance from Playboy.

With opening notes that contain accords of pomegranate bellini cocktail and pink berries the fragrance is one that comes as a luscious burst of flavors in the opening notes. Tiger lily passion flower and heliotrope are the accords that make up the heart as it trails down into a dry down of amber sandalwood and vanilla. The fragrance comes in a typical Playboy flacon with black and golden accents that highlight her glamor factor. For the woman who is all female and all playfulness Play It Spicy Deo Spray is a fragrance that leaves a trail of hearts and unfulfilled desires.

column17:
Playboy Play it Lovely Deodorant Spray - 150 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.199

Key Features

  • Light Easy-to-wear Fragrance
  • Uplifting Notes of Zesty Citrus Blackberry and Pear
  • Delicate Floral Notes and Sensual Amber

For the diva who dismisses all the attention with a lazy flick of her long lashes Playboy presents the Play It Lovely fragrance that captures the imaginations of dozens enslaving them to her sole will.

Light Fragrance

The deodorant spray is one that is light and floats in the aura around you making it the perfect day fragrance that will keep you fresh throughout.

Uplifting Notes

With light notes of citrus colliding with luscious blackberry and juicy pear the fragrance of the mass premium is one that will capture hearts and uplift your spirits.

Delicate and Sensual

Frivolous and feminine the deodorant also combines florals with the depths of amber to give rise to a perfume that you won’t soon forget.
